Home Gallery Slideshow Flavours Order Contact Info Company Info Ice Cream FAQs Description Home Flavours
Do you have lactose free ice cream? Is your ice cream nut free? Do you offer deals? What are your store timings? Does your restaurant have any other locations? Do you do deliveries? Yes we offer lactose free alternatives. Just ask! There are certain flavours containing nuts while others don’t. Ice cream can be ordered without nuts if preferred. Deals are sometimes mailed and can be found by signing up on our app. We often offer seasonal promotions so look out for those as well, Monday – Thursday: 10:00 am – 10:00 pm
 Friday – Sunday: 10:00 am – 11:00 pm
No, we do not have other location. While we don’t offer delivery through our app or website we are partnered with UberEATS and door dash so orders can be made through there.
